==Quechua Spell Checking Plugin Installation Guide for [http://www.openoffice.org/download/ OpenOffice] or [http://www.libreoffice.org/download LibreOffice]==

===1. Go to the [http://hinantin.com/sc/download.php download page], choose the plugin you want and download it.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/001_download.png">

===2. Go to the download location and double click on the oxt file.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/002_navigate.png">


===3. The Plugin Manager will prompt you if you want to install it, click the "OK" button.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/003_clic_ok.png">

===4. Check if the plugin was correctly installed, search for our logo in the plugin list.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/004_check_installation.png">


===5. Close and reopen the application (OpenOffice/LibreOffice).===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/005_close_reopen.png">

==Using the Spell Checking Plugin==

===6. Create a new "Writer document".===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/006_new_document.png">

===7. Write a text and select it.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/007_write_select.png">

==If you are using Windows follow steps 8-9 and skip step 10 otherwise go to step 10.==

===8. Go to the bottom of the application and click on the language option.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/008_language_clic.png">

===9. Select the "More ..." option.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/009_more_language.png">

==If you are not using Windows:==

===10. Go to the application menu and click on Tools-&gt;Language-&gt;For Selection-&gt;More... option.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/013_menu_language.png">

===11. Select "Quechua (Bolivia - South)" from the language combobox.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/010_select_language.png">

===12. After selecting "Quechua (Bolivia - South)" as language, click the "OK" button.===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/011_select_language_ok.png">

====13. Right-click on a word to get a list of suggested corrections (none if the word is correctly spelled).===
<img src="http://hinantin.com/sc/images/installation/012_right_clic.png">
